name: Have a Super Day
description:
You wake up one morning with a strange dream fresh in your memory. When you leave your apartment, your day gets even stranger. What does your dream mean? And why is there a weird green glow at the entrance to the nearest subway station?

“Have a Super Day” is an interactive fiction game book featuring elements of superhero fiction, weird fiction, and climate fiction. Based on your choices, the plot can go in two broad directions with about ten total endings. I hope you enjoy it!

Author

My name is Treesong. If you enjoy this game, please support it! Your support makes future games possible. Tell me what types of games you want to see next and I'll see what I can do.

You might also like:

  • My itch.io page
  • My other writing
  • My Patreon

Thank you for reading, playing, and supporting my interactive fiction!
